yoga_sessions.name: Morning Energizer
yoga_sessions.description: A quick session to start your day with energy.

yoga_sessions.name: Evening Wind Down
yoga_sessions.description: A gentle session to relax before bed.

Morning Energizer.name: Sun Salutation A
Morning Energizer.description: A classic vinyasa flow to warm up the body.

Morning Energizer.name: Warrior I
Morning Energizer.description: A powerful standing pose that builds strength and confidence.

Morning Energizer.name: Warrior II
Morning Energizer.description: A powerful standing pose that builds strength and confidence.

Morning Energizer.name: Triangle Pose
Morning Energizer.description: A standing pose that stretches the hamstrings, hips, and spine.

Evening Wind Down.name: Child's Pose
Evening Wind Down.description: A resting pose that gently stretches the back, hips, and ankles.

Evening Wind Down.name: Cat-Cow Pose
Evening Wind Down.description: A gentle flow between two poses that warms the spine and relieves back stress.

Evening Wind Down.name: Corpse Pose
Evening Wind Down.description: A final resting pose for deep relaxation.
